author: odoo
comments: esc pos hardware driver                          this module allows odoo print esc pos compatible printers open esc pos controlled cashdrawers point sale modules would need functionality              coding  utf 8        part odoo  see license file full copyright licensing details
content:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# Part of Odoo. See LICENSE file for full copyright and licensing details.

{
    'name': 'ESC/POS Hardware Driver',
    'category': 'Point of Sale',
    'sequence': 6,
    'website': 'https://www.odoo.com/page/point-of-sale',
    'summary': 'Hardware Driver for ESC/POS Printers and Cashdrawers',
    'description': """
ESC/POS Hardware Driver
=======================

This module allows Odoo to print with ESC/POS compatible printers and
to open ESC/POS controlled cashdrawers in the point of sale and other modules
that would need such functionality.

""",
    'depends': ['hw_proxy'],
    'external_dependencies': {
        'python' : ['usb.core','serial','qrcode'],
    },
}
description: Odoo. Open Source Apps To Grow Your Business.
